intro.p: Declares that for the specific method (action) no filter should be applied -- or an specific filter should be skipped.

section.title: SkipFilterAttribute()
section.p: Constructs a SkipFilterAttribute which skips all filters.

section.title: SkipFilterAttribute(System.Type filterType)
section.p: Constructs a SkipFilterAttribute associating the filter type that should be skipped.

tr.td: The filter type to be skipped
Gets the type of the filter.
